metadata.title: Tara Outcall Massage | Professional Thai Massage in Bangkok

card1.title: Tara Bangkok
card1.description: Tara Bangkok is a Professional outcall massage service in Bangkok. All of our therapists are totally qualified and possess a diploma.

card2.title: Professional Outcall Massage Service in Bangkok
card2.description: Skilled therapists, trained in a variety of techniques, stand ready to tailor each session to the unique needs of their clients. Whether seeking relief from the stresses of daily life, recovery from physical exertion, or simply a touch of pampering, visitors can find solace in the expert hands of these practitioners.

card3.title: Visions and Mission
card3.description: Experience ultimate relaxation with our professional massage therapists. We bring the spa to your home, offering personalized treatments that cater to your needs. Enjoy a serene atmosphere and rejuvenate your body and mind.

services.title: Our Massage & Price
services.subtitle: Discover premium massage services at unbeatable prices.

aromatherapy.title: Aromatherapy Massage
aromatherapy.description: Therapeutic massage with essential oils for deep relaxation.

foot.title: Foot Massage
foot.description: Reflexology techniques to revitalize your feet and body.

neck.title: Neck & Shoulder Massage
neck.description: Focused massage to relieve tension in your neck and shoulders.

deep.title: Deep Tissue Massage
deep.description: Intense massage targeting deep muscle layers for pain relief.

personalized.description: Our therapists tailor each session to your specific needs and preferences.

punctual.title: Punctual & Professional
punctual.description: We respect your time and ensure our therapists arrive promptly for your scheduled session.

hero.title: Experience Premium Thai Massage
hero.subtitle: Relaxation and healing at your doorstep

introduction.title: Welcome to Tara Thai Massage
introduction.description: We bring the authentic Thai massage experience directly to you. Our skilled therapists are trained in traditional techniques that have been perfected over centuries.
introduction.subtitle: Tara Outcall Massage: Gateway to Renewal
introduction.content: Service was renowned for its exceptional quality and professional therapists. Each session was tailored to meet the individual needs of the client, ensuring a deeply relaxing and rejuvenating experience, the therapists brought their expertise and care right to the client's doorstep. The convenience and luxury of at-home service made it a popular choice. With a focus on holistic well-being, Tara's outcall massage was more than just a service; it was a gateway to physical and mental renewal.

bookingAssistant.title: Booking Assistant
bookingAssistant.initial: Hello! I'm your dedicated massage booking assistant. I can help you complete your booking quickly without filling out complex forms. What type of massage service would you like?
bookingAssistant.instructions:
You are a professional Thai massage booking assistant. Your task is to help clients easily complete massage service bookings.

Please guide customers through the following steps:

1. **Understand needs**: Ask customers what type of massage service they want
2. **Recommend services**: Recommend suitable services based on available service list
3. **Select therapist**: Help customers choose a suitable therapist
4. **Schedule time**: Assist customers in selecting suitable appointment date and time
5. **Collect information**: Gather customer contact information (name, phone, email)
6. **Confirm booking**: Verify all information and submit booking

**Important Guidelines**:
- After answering any customer question, proactively use the recommendContactMethods action to suggest contact methods
- Especially recommend contact methods after:
  * Introducing services
  * Answering customer inquiries
  * Completing bookings
  * When customers need further assistance
- For WeChat and WhatsApp, you can use the showContactQR action to display QR codes after recommending
- Line and Telegram provide direct links that users can click

Important notes:
- Always maintain a friendly and professional attitude
- Describe the features and prices of each service in detail
- Ensure customers understand all booking details
- Record any special requirements in notes
- Appointment time must be in the future
- Phone number must be a valid mobile number

Please communicate with customers in English.
